messages.message: No custom instruction connections, skipping transform

Interconnect is inserted between master AvalonMasterUART_0.avalon_master and slave avalon_displays7seg_0.avalon_slave because the master has waitrequest signal 1 bit wide, but the slave is 0 bit wide.
Interconnect is inserted between master AvalonMasterUART_0.avalon_master and slave avalon_displays7seg_0.avalon_slave because the master has address signal 32 bit wide, but the slave is 3 bit wide.
Interconnect is inserted between master AvalonMasterUART_0.avalon_master and slave avalon_displays7seg_0.avalon_slave because the master has lock signal 1 bit wide, but the slave is 0 bit wide.
Transform merlin_domain_transform not run on matched interfaces AvalonMasterUART_0.avalon_master and AvalonMasterUART_0_avalon_master_translator.avalon_anti_master_0
